scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Andrea
scrape.text: How far would you go to protect the ones you love? That is the question that keeps repeating over and over again in my head. This book takes place over the duration of a fancy dinner between two couples. Two couples that have a terrible secret they are keeping that involve their young sons. A secret that can ruin their sons lives as well as their own.I found this book to be very dark and disturbing. It was slow at the beginning but I think it had to be in order to really pack a punch at the end. Truly twisted.Actual rating 3.5 Stars.
